Details: Chose warehouse location for storing imported laptops. Considered security, accessibility, and cost.
Implementing system to track stock levels and locations. Using spreadsheets or simple inventory software.
Establish guidelines for handling and storing laptops. Include ESD precautions and labeling.
Provide training on inventory management system and best practices.
Regularly check and report on stock status. Set reorder points for supplies.
Schedule periodic inventory audits to catch discrepancies.
